claims.claim: Resources and facilities in Detroit public schools are inferior to those in suburban areas.
claims.quote: even with education. Those resources in Detroit versus where I was in, out Utica, Sterling Heights night and day. The, the resources in there, computer labs and things with, with my babies out there. Phenomenal here in the Detroit public school system, not so much.

claims.claim: The distribution of educational resources is unequal, disadvantaging Detroit public schools.
claims.quote: The way that things are done and, and the distribution of resources, it, it here in Detroit night and day and, and. Something needs to be done.

claims.claim: Legislation and policies contribute to the unequal distribution of resources in public schools.
claims.quote: those things that we've been talking about, the legislation and how they choose to,when they have these millages and that that data that everybody have to come to, to the school to get counted and mm-hmm.
